Owl_of_Minerva  

![](https://www.owlpages.com/owls/articles/images/tetradrachm-1.jpg) first character [ğ“Œ¸](ğ“Œ¸) Mer â‡¨ Miras? AOE Owl  

Ammer:Bird  
Owl awe  
mo[gul](gul) Magie moye eyes.  
Muertou bird of darkness & death.  
Barn Owl "bird of doom."  
The Custom of nailing an Owl to a barn door to ward off evil and lightning persisted into the 19th century.  

![](https://www.owlpages.com/owls/articles/images/spedis_owl_ralph_turner.jpg)  

This petroglyph, the 'Spedis Owl' was salvaged from along the Columbia River
